content:
{"name": "St. Mark’s United Methodist Church -Nourish Up - Referral Required", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Previously "Loaves & Fishes/Friendship Trays". New name. Same mission.

This is an emergency food pantry that requires a referral. 

**How To Get A Referral:**
To get a referral please have the following information ready for each person in the household:
▪ First and Last Name
▪ Date of Birth
▪ Phone Number (if available)
▪ Current Address
▪ Gender
▪ Ethnicity
▪ Veteran Status
▪ Receiving Food Stamps/SNAP**
▪ Household Income**
▪ Disability (Y or N)
▪ Email Address (if available)
▪ Date of Pick Up
▪ Preferred Pantry Location and secondary location in case the primary location is at capacity.

To access pop-up food shares for excess fresh items, no referral, ID or financial documents are required. Pre-registration is required to ensure there is enough food. Follow this link to see locations and register:  https://nourishup.org/foodshare/

Visit our website at https://nourishup.org/pantries/ under the food pantries tab for all of our location and hours.", "email": "", "url": "https://nourishup.org/pantries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "917 Clanton Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Clanton Park/Roseland", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28217", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.1987721, "longitude": -80.88797509999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 523-7483", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral Required. Lemontree can provide this referral. Please see the requirements in notes."}]}
